main event: Four witnesses observed four unidentified flying objects maneuvering in the sky over Middleboro, Massachusetts on June 8, 1964.
interesting points: The objects appeared slow-moving, at an altitude of 400-500 feet, and maneuvered for about 5 minutes before going out of sight.
The objects were described as white-silver and red in color, and appeared to be very large, bright, and bluish-green.
The objects moved with incredible speed and made sharp changes in direction, unlike anything the witnesses had seen before.

The witness, a 15-year-old amateur astronomer, had a 4-inch reflecting telescope and had seen many unusual things in the sky, but could not identify these objects as any known natural or man-made objects.
The sighting lasted for 3-5 minutes, and the witness reported the incident to the Project Blue Book Investigations Section in Washington, D.C.
